Name: Northern Territory Library, Northern Territory Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-5pm and Sat-Sun 1pm-5pm; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available.

About.Acquisition focus: All material (books, serials, maps, photographs) on Northern Territory. Non-printed material is excluded as are artefacts and paintings.

About.References: Loos, Michael,: 'The Northern Australia Collection of the State Reference Library of the Northern Territory'. Journal of Northern Territory History No1 (1990): 38-39.
